meta.title: Tech Stack | Dev Showcase
meta.description: All technologies, libraries and tools used in Dev Showcase — versions, categories and motivation for each choice.

hero.title: Technologies we use
hero.description: Each library was chosen with purpose. Learn about the full stack and the motivation behind each decision.

framework.title: Project foundation
framework.description: The heart of the application — framework, runtime and language.

next.name: Next.js
next.description: React framework with App Router, Server Components, SSR/SSG and API Routes.
next.why: Best DX for full-stack React apps with native SEO and performance support.

react.name: React
react.description: Library for building interfaces with declarative components.
react.why: Mature ecosystem, Server Components in React 19, powerful hooks.

ui.title: Interface and visual
ui.description: Components, styles and animations that create the visual experience.

tailwind.name: Tailwind CSS
tailwind.description: Utility-first CSS framework for fast and consistent styling.
tailwind.why: Fast dev, native dark mode, tree-shaking, v4 with new engine.

radix.name: Radix UI
radix.description: Accessible and unstyled UI primitives — tabs, dialog, toast, switch.

framerMotion.name: Framer Motion
framerMotion.why: Reusable variants, viewport control, exit animations.

lucide.name: Lucide React
lucide.description: Clean and consistent SVG icons with tree-shaking.
lucide.why: Lightweight, wide variety, simple API as React components.

cva.name: CVA
cva.description: Class Variance Authority for typed component variants.
cva.why: Type-safe variants for components with Tailwind.

shadcn.name: shadcn/ui
shadcn.description: Collection of copyable components based on Radix + Tailwind.
shadcn.why: Customizable, no lock-in, copy-paste with full control.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Support for 4 languages with strong typing and automatic translation.

nextIntl.name: next-intl
nextIntl.description: Internationalization for Next.js with App Router and Server Components.
nextIntl.why: Strong typing, namespaces, App Router compatible without rewrites.

deepl.name: DeepL API
deepl.why: Natural translations for en, es, de from pt-BR.

openai.name: OpenAI SDK
openai.description: Official SDK for GPT-4, streaming and chat completions.
openai.why: Chatbot and AI code review, native streaming.

resend.name: Resend
resend.description: Modern API for sending transactional emails.
resend.why: Excellent DX, React Email, no spam.

zod.name: Zod
zod.why: API validation, forms, type-safe, v4 with improved performance.

devTools.title: Development tools
devTools.description: Linting, formatting, commits and code quality.

eslint.name: ESLint
eslint.description: Linter for JavaScript/TypeScript with configurable rules.
eslint.why: Flat config v9, integrated with Prettier and import sort.

prettier.name: Prettier
prettier.why: Zero style discussion, auto-format on save.

husky.name: Husky
husky.description: Native Git hooks — pre-commit and commit-msg.
husky.why: Ensures lint and commit format before push.

commitlint.name: Commitlint
commitlint.description: Validation of commit messages in Conventional Commits format.

vitest.name: Vitest
vitest.description: Fast test framework compatible with Vite and TypeScript.
vitest.why: Jest API compatible, fast, native HMR.

testingLibrary.name: Testing Library
testingLibrary.description: Utilities for testing React components focusing on user behavior.

vercel.name: Vercel
vercel.description: Deploy platform with PR preview, edge functions and analytics.
vercel.why: Automatic deploy, preview URLs, native Next.js integration.

vercelAnalytics.name: Vercel Analytics
vercelAnalytics.description: Web analytics with performance metrics (Web Vitals).
vercelAnalytics.why: Zero config, Core Web Vitals, no bundle impact.
